message.body: How is my little Ry guy doing?
He is great! Getting all 4 molars so a little unhappy about that. He's a funny little guy. How's coop?

They are so funny. So active. Cooper hit his head yesterday and we had to take him to the hospital to get stitches. I think he got 3 or 4. It bled a lot but didn't look that bad once it stopped. Little scary but not too bad.
Oh no :( what did he hit it on? Where? Scary but glad he's ok! Rylan always has bruises all I we his face/head. Coop takes after aunt Linds ;)
Yep. About an inch above his eye.
Is it black today?
Yeah just the other night he smacked his forehead way harder and had a big knot. But they heal so fast.
And get over it quick!
Not too bad. He hit the corner of the base of the pole that holds up the railing at the bottom of our stairs.
Does he eat a lot?
He is fighting food a lot right now. Really wares Kristen our
Out.
Have to distract him
Ouch! Ugh
In and out of hospital in just over an hour though. And he was happy as could be by the time we got home.
They are good like that and glad it wasn't a long wait!
Food is my arch enemy
Is Ry eating good?
Is that the saying? Arch?
Haha. So sounds like the same
Yes but hard to find enough for him to eat
I think so. Always sounds weird when you type it instead of say it
He just decided no more baby food
Yeah. You have limited choices too.
Cooper likes lunch meat. Turkey
Ry looooves animals
Animals? Animal crackers?
Real animals
Rylan likes that kind if turkey too
Haha yeah. Can't wait for them to hang out. Hopefully early June.
I hope you guys come out then! It will be fun to see them together :) we could go to the zoo and look at real animals
Tell Kristen I feel her pain, rylan just threw his whole dinner to Zoe except blueberries....
